text:
Cc iu Khon Thu V Theo o Lut Chm Sc Sc Khe Gi Phi Chng Dnh Cho C Nhn V Gia nh

Ma Khai Thu 2020 Theo o Lut V Gim Thu V Vic Lm, c thng qua ngy 22 thng 12 nm 2017, s tin thanh ton theo trch nhim chung ca tng c nhn s gim xung bng khng trong cc thng bt u sau ngy 31 thng 12 nm 2018. Bt u t nm thu 2019, Mu 1040 s khng c "bo him chm sc sc khe c nm hoc min tr" v Mu 8965, Min Tr Bo Him Y T, s khng cn c s dng. Qu v khng cn np tin chi tr chia s trch nhim hoc Mu 8965 Min Tr Bo Him Y T, cng vi t khai thu nu qu v khng c bo him cn thit ti thiu cho mt phn hoc ton b nm 2019. Yu Cu v iu Chnh Tn Thu Bo Ph Nu qu v mua bo him thng qua Th trng Bo him Y t th c th iu kin c hng tn thu bo ph. iu kin (ting Anh) Yu cu v i chiu (ting Anh) thay i hon cnh (ting Anh)
